name: Valkey LXC
description: Valkey is an open source (BSD) high-performance key/value datastore that supports a variety of workloads.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# install Valkey LXC
wget https://example.com/valkey-lxc.sh -O valkey-lxc.sh
bash valkey-lxc.sh

name: Qdrant LXC
description: Qdrant is a vector search engine and vector database for high-dimensional vectors.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# install Qdrant LXC
wget https://example.com/qdrant-lxc.sh -O qdrant-lxc.sh
bash qdrant-lxc.sh

name: OPNsense VM
description: OPNsense is an open-source firewall and routing platform based on FreeBSD.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# install OPNsense VM
wget https://example.com/opnsense-vm.sh -O opnsense-vm.sh
bash opnsense-vm.sh

name: Docker LXC
description: Docker is an open-source project for automating the deployment of applications as containers.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# install Docker LXC
wget https://example.com/docker-lxc.sh -O docker-lxc.sh
bash docker-lxc.sh

name: Home Assistant Container
description: Container-based installation of Home Assistant Core, suitable for running inside SvNTools LXC.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# install Home Assistant Container
wget https://example.com/home-assistant-container.sh -O ha-container.sh
bash ha-container.sh

name: PVE Post Install
description: This script provides options for managing SvNTools repositories and common post-install tasks.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# PVE post install steps
wget https://example.com/pve-post-install.sh -O pve-post-install.sh
bash pve-post-install.sh
